original_title: Bella Dancerella - Cinderella - Dance and Sing Along
overview: Step into Cinderella's enchanted world.... This 40 minute VHS video takes you through a lively retelling of the classic fairy tale, complete with fun songs and easy to follow dance routines. So have a "ball" with Bella, Cinderella and friends, learning how to move awith all the grace and charm of a little princess!
title: Bella Dancerella - Cinderella - Dance and Sing Along
